Trigger.Name: 1 Twin Snakes Set
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Disciplined Fist

Trigger.Name: Twin Snakes End
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Disciplined Fist.

Trigger.Name: 1 Leaden Fist Set (English)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Leaden Fist

Trigger.Name: 1 Leaden Fist End (Bootshine)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Leaden Fist

Trigger.Name: Anatman 0
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Anatman

Trigger.Name: Form Shift Loss
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Formless Fist

Trigger.Name: Raptor Off (English)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Raptor Form

Trigger.Name: Opo Off (English)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Opo-Opo Form

Trigger.Name: Coeurl Off (English)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Coeurl Form

Trigger.Name: Perfect Loss
Trigger.RegularExpression: You lose the effect of Perfect Balance

Trigger.Name: Perfect Stacks -1
Trigger.RegularExpression: You use (Dragon Kick|Twin Snakes|Demolish|Bootshine|True Strike|Snap Punch|Arm of the|Four-point|Rockbreaker|Shadow of)

Trigger.Name: Beta (No Regex)
Trigger.Description:
M O N K
Monk is the only Job that becomes much more enjoyable with a HUD of this nature in my opinion.
I will attempt to maintain this MNK HUD in English (No Regex) until someone emulates it in one of the Dalamud UI plugins.
If you would like to volunteer your time to regex ths HUD to improve it's update speed and make it available for non-english clients that would be greatly appreciated.
